Articles.Content:
Whenever I put the Flight Engineer unit (the chip) on a craft I'm building, no dialog box appears (the UI of Flight Engineer). I'm using Sandbox mode on the world I'm building the craft. Any help?

Edited February 20, 2021 by SynergyBoi
By the way, it's actually Kerbal Engineer Redux, so I'm sorry for any confusion caused. Now that I think about it, it seems like I installed the wrong version of the mod.
